availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas B, Crutcher (Nicholasville, Jessamine County, Kentucky, merchant)

body.p: Nicholasville, Jessamine County, Kentucky, merchant. Kentucky native. Son of Norvel and Sarah Crutcher. Married to Sarah Price Crutcher in Bardstown, Nelson County, Kentucky, on May 2, 1854. Father of John Crutcher, Benjamin Crutcher, and Elizabeth Crutcher. Attended school in Jessamine County, Kentucky, in 1850. Merchant in Jessamine County in 1850. Merchant in Nicholasville, Jessamine County, Kentucky, in 1860. Owned two enslaved persons in Nicholasville in 1860. Merchant in Jessamine County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jessamine County, District 2, p. 41B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jessamine County, Nicholasville, p. 122.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jessamine County, Nicholasville, p. 310A.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Jessamine County, KY, July 1863, p. 4.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Nelson County Marriages, Film 001929414, p. 53.
Lineage Book of the Charter Members of the National Society of the Daughters of the American Revolution, eds. Mary S. Lockwood and Susan Riviere Hetzel (Washington, D. C.: National Society of the Daughters of the American Revolution, 1891-1939) vol. 137: 1917-1918, p. 76.
"Thomas B. Crutcher (1831-1903)," Find A Grave, Memorial 88952690, accessed June 16, 2023, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/88952690.
